title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VIII, pt. 641 - Enforcement Personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VIII, pt. 641 - Enforcement Personnel

State Regulations
§ 641.1 - Designation of employees having peace officer powers and of those having general enforcement powers
§ 641.2 - Designation of employees who shall enforce article 33 of the environmental conservation law and those portions of article 15 dealing with the use of chemicals in water
§ 641.3 - Designation of employees who enforce only article 13 of the environmental conservation law
§ 641.4 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VIII, pt. 641

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§71-0201, 71-0505

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
